title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/12/18
itunes:title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/12/18
description:
George Noory and author Matthew LaCroix discuss his research into lost civilizations that have been wiped out from Earth, and what ancient knowledge and technology might have been lost with them.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
